channel.title: conciousness on Emiliano
channel.description: Recent content in conciousness on Emiliano

item.title: After after
item.description: Something that interests me greatly is the thought of the afterlife. What happens at the instant of leaving this world? More especifically, at the conciousness level or as some might say, spiritual. For now, I won’t go into the rabbithole of what conciousness and the spirit (which are mostly thought as the samething) are. I’d definitely recommend Julian Jaynes’ book The Origin of Consciousness in the Breakdown of the Bicameral Mind if you want to read up on that and more.
